thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 7 of 3218
thread.title: Marcelo Higa

author: Marcelo Higa
title: Marcelo Higa
text:
You have to call the company once you get at the airport for the pick up (about 15 minutes drive). They were very fast there.
It takes about 30 minutes untill you get the car but I believe that is not a company's problem but the brazilian burocracy in general
We got a much better car than we booked what made our travel much more confortable
It was very easy to keep the car for some days more only by calling with the same conditions
Return was a bit tricky because my GPS couldn't find the number of the company, but the street only (which was enough)
very fast and friendly check out
I speak portuguese so I can not tell if the staff were good enough in english or not
